subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: John Isner, the top seed, overpowered Dudi Sela to successfully defend his Atlanta Open title, blasting serve after serve past Sela in a 6-3, 6-4 victory.
snippet: John Isner, the top seed, overpowered Dudi Sela to successfully defend his Atlanta Open title, blasting serve after serve past Sela in a 6-3, 6-4 victory.
